channel.title: [PI/DSPK] Memory Issue
channel.description:
I keep having the same issue when host this server for some friends, when a large number of players are on there's a chance that everyone will DC, but some their characters will remain logged in and they can't relog until a restart. Basically, when a large amount of people are on, the character files start to fuck themselves.
FormationX base.

item.description:
@C_Imbued wrote:

Yeah DSPK is shit and unstable. :S
